title: Cadet worlds: Portugal, 1974
creator_credit: Don Anderson and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
brief_description: Two helmsmen from Tasmania were selected to represent Australia in the 1974 ‘cadet’ Dinghy World Championships. Beginning with the Tasmanian crews mid-winter training at the Sandy Bay Sailing Club in Hobart, the action culminates in the competitions sailed in Portugal.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Anderson and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
